item.title: War of the Words
Bill Salus: The Point of No Return
The Coming Solar Eclipse | Alexis Katz
item.itunes:summary:
Join Mondo as he interviews Alexis Katz. She wrote a complete guide highlighting over 350 cities which were under the shadow of the 2017 solar eclipse and also the major cities which will be in totality for the upcoming April 2024 eclipse.


Amidst the many rumors circulating on the internet, her book is the definitive source for covering all of the cities. Are there really 7 Ninevehs covered by the eclipse? The answer is No and she shows you why. They discuss the data and also the limits of what the data can show.

We also begin to explore the idea of suffering. Why it is a central idea in Christianity? How does it bring us closer to Christ? What does it produce in us? While this message covers some challenging topics, it also encourages us to persevere as the difficulties we face are not wasted.

item.itunes:summary: If you stop and really look at the world, the people and things around you…you will quickly realize how frail life is. Things change in an instant. People are born and die. Relationships start and end, nothing is permanent or even seem to last very long. This view of life and existence might be very depressing…unless you are a Christian. Gary’s message on 1 Peter will have the weight of life's frailty rolling off your shoulders, as he offers a new view of the existence and future for blood-bought believers in Christ.

item.itunes:summary:
Many of you may know that Gary was once the pastor of a small Bible church in Oklahoma City. His messages were full of in-depth Bible teaching that studied Scripture verse by verse in a methodical, literal, relevant way. What some people may not know is that these messages were recorded and were shared, only with his congregation...until now! We've decided to reach into 'the vault' of these timeless messages to share hope and the solidity of Scripture with a world that is becoming more disheartening by the hour. Join us each week to grow in your walk with the Lord and the knowledge of the Bible as we share Gary's best and most beloved teachings!

Delve into the elements of Passover with Gary as we celebrate Resurrection Sunday this weekend. This message will offer a deeper understanding of this Jewish festival and a greater appreciation of what Jesus' sacrifice means for all of us.

item.itunes:summary: Much confusion surrounds the study of Bible prophecy, which we find curious since most everyone wants to know what will happen in the future. Most churches don’t teach or study Bible prophecy and rarely look at the role of Israel in future events. Some pastors are simply unfamiliar with the subject, while others fear it will divide their church or even scare away their members with the troubling images found in the Book of Revelation.

item.itunes:summary: A shepherd boy throwing rocks in the Judean desert was all it took for God to reveal 900 ancient parchments to the world, parchments that contained just about every book of the Old Testament. These important scrolls, which took many years to translate, provide us with irrefutable proof that the books of the Bible, many written over 2500 years ago, contain the very same writings found in the Dead Sea scrolls. As we watch world events spin out of control, the Essene calendar suggests that the year 2025 seems to have some major prophetic significance. Could the return of Jesus be right over the horizon?

item.itunes:summary: Secreted within the pages of the Bible lie a series of hidden gems that are only visible in the original Hebrew language. Dr. Danny Ben Gigi makes the Scriptures come alive through the language of God, giving us a new and deeper appreciation for God’s Word. item.title: Larry Ollison: God's Dispensational Plan
item.itunes:summary: It’s impossible to ignore the role that Lucifer played in the fall of mankind. As hard as it is to believe, many church-going people don’t believe in a literal Satan anymore. Is Satan real? Are demons real? Was the rebellion and fall of the fallen angel Lucifer the catalyst that prompted God to send His son to die for the sins of mankind? Was Lucifer here on earth in the ancient past, long before the creation of Adam and Eve? Are we living on a restored, ancient Earth? Or is the Earth relatively young as some believe? According to the Bible, we are living in a sinful, ruined world that finds itself on the pathway to complete restoration. At the end of that process we find the kingdom of heaven and eternity, but most Christians know very little about their eternal home. Pastors, Gary Stearman and Larry Ollison, take on the challenge of creating a timeline of events, past, present and future, and focusing on what God has planned in the ages to come. Larry’s book, The Paradise of God, will open your eyes to the hope we have in Christ!

Bill Salus: Mystery Babylon and the Harlot
item.itunes:summary: Revelation 17 has been the subject of much confusion for many years. Who is the woman who rides the beast? And who is the beast? Can we identify the kings and the kingdoms referenced by John the apostle? And where is the city that sits on seven hills located? 7 heads, 7 mountains, 10 kings! Babylon, Mystery Babylon, a great city destroyed in one hour . . . wow . . . no wonder people are confused! Leave it to two great Bible teachers, Gary Stearman and Bill Salus to lend their voices to the ages-old debate. Don’t miss their insights. You’re about to discover the identity of the woman, the beast and the great city!

Babylon, Mystery Babylon, a great city destroyed in one hour . . . wow . . . no wonder people are confused! Leave it to two great Bible teachers, Gary Stearman and Bill Salus to lend their voices to the ages-old debate. Don’t miss their insights. You’re about to discover the identity of the woman, the beast and the great city!

item.title: L.A. Marzulli: The Mysterious Moundbuilders
item.itunes:summary: Two millennia ago, a culture that is still unknown to us today, erected thousands of mounds throughout the United States. The discovery of these mounds created a controversy as some claimed that the mounds were built by an unknown lost tribe of people, however, is this the truth of what occurred in the ancient past, or has the information been managed to bolster a particular narrative? Join Gary Stearman and L.A. Marzulli for this fascinating inside look at his continued pursuit of the giants of the Bible, the Nephilim of Genesis 6.

item.title: Bill Koenig: A Prophetic Eye on 2019
item.itunes:summary: As we kick off 2019, the world is coming apart at the seams. Recent events in the Middle East involving Israel, Russia, Turkey, Iran, Iraq, Syria and Saudi Arabia have students of prophecy wondering if we are on the brink of eternity. Is World War 3 imminent? Then, there’s the “Deep State” and the political situation in the USA, a never-ending nightmare unfolding before our eyes. We’ve never seen such worldwide chaos! Leave it to Gary Stearman and Bill Koenig to take a look at the current climate in the Middle East from a biblical perspective and remind us that the God of Israel never slumbers or sleeps!

item.title: Aaron Lipkin: Mysteries of Archaeology
Bill Salus: Exploring Ezekiel 38
item.itunes:summary: Bill Salus burst on the prophetic scene a few years ago with a focus on a handful of the Bible’s ancient, Old Testament prophecies. From his interpretation of the upcoming Psalm 83 War, to the Iranian, “Nuclear Boomerang” prophecies of Jeremiah 49, and then the “Doom of Damascus” prophecies in Isaiah 17 . . . Bill has developed quite a faithful following. And for good reason. He has a heart for the Gospel and the lost. Now, we may be standing on the verge of another area of Bill’s intense focus, the coming Russian/Iranian attack on Israel . . . the Battle of Gog and Magog. Only time will tell if we are there, but you will definitely want to hear what Gary and Bill have to say about the future! Inquiring minds want to know.

The Big Announcement!
item.itunes:summary:
We are counting our blessings this morning after a wonderful night at our prophecy conference last night. Gary and Bob shared their big secret publicly for the first time and if we weren't all so exhausted, we'd still be awake early this morning counting the massive amount of gifts donated for the acquisition of the new Prophecy Watchers International Communications Center in Oklahoma City. WHAT A BLESSING!

If you haven't heard yet, we have been given the opportunity to acquire a real soundproofed TV Studio, solving many of our growing pain issues. It's 4,000 square feet of studio space that we'll convert into multiple studios and a 13,250 SF building and 30+ acres of land comes along with it! It even has a soundproofed radio studio! Where is God taking this ministry? He seems to be full of unexpected surprises! But as always we're trusting Him to show us the way.

Another great blessing has occurred since we made the announcement, so we have another awesome announcement to make! We have been blessed and highly favored—by God and by many of you. So again, we want to say THANK YOU.

item.itunes:summary: Signs! Wonders! Miracles! Healings! Social Justice! Coffee bars and guitar solos! Many of our modern churches seem to have lost their way. Why is prophecy not being taught in our churches today? Why do so few pastors teach their congregations about Israel and her role in end-time prophecy? Is anyone still looking for the King's return? Will Jesus find faith when He returns? Whatever happened to the simple Gospel message on salvation and heaven and hell? Long-time radio legend, Jan Markell, joins Gary to expose the agenda of today's modern churches and along the way, exposes several of the ringleaders of the anti-rapture movement. Are we living in the last days? Jan's answer may surprise you!

item.title: Gary Stearman: We See the Day Approaching
Billy Crone: The Seals of Revelation, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: In the last 20 years, many Christians have moved away from solid dispensational Bible teaching. They have adopted unique new ways of interpreting several key Bible prophecies, specifically the ones that deal with the timing of the Rapture of the Church and the Tribulation Period. Many people are under the false assumption that the first three and a half years of the Tribulation are a time of peace and tranquility. Some are teaching that those first three and half years, when over 2 BILLION people die, represents the wrath of man, or even worse, the wrath of Satan! A new wave of Bible teachers are espousing the “pre-wrath” theory and the “6th-seal rapture theory,” believing God is going to put us through a time of persecution before we are raptured. Still others believe that the seals of Revelation have already been opened and we are already in the Tribulation! Passionate pastor, Billy Crone, was reduced to tears as he examined God’s wrath on an unbelieving world during the Tribulation period. Gary and Billy take a fresh look at the rapture of the Church and the Seals of Revelation, opening our eyes to the harsh reality of what lies ahead for our world. Get in the Ark before it’s too late!

item.title: Ryan Pitterson: Judgment of the Nephilim
item.itunes:summary: Genesis 6 is one of the most controversial chapters in the Bible. The original Hebrew language in Genesis 6:4 describes a bizarre marital relationship between a group of fallen angels and human women, resulting in a race of hybrid giants the Bible calls the Nephilim. This was a blatant attempt by Satan to corrupt the bloodline of the Messiah. Many connect this sinful act of genetic rebellion against God with the worldwide, destructive flood of Noah. Columbia Law School graduate, Ryan Pitterson, spent 3 years of his life researching and writing the most comprehensive book on the Nephilim ever published—The Judgment of the Nephilim. Drawing on Scripture, little-known historical sources, and the writings of the ancient church fathers, Pitterson will take you places few have gone before. Join Gary and Ryan as they take a fresh look at this curious, but biblically-important subject!

item.title: Jan Markell: What in the World is Going On
Ken Johnson: Mysteries of the Ancients
item.itunes:summary: Try and imagine joining Bible scholar Ken Johnson on a secret excavation in the caves of Qumran and making a spectacular new Dead Sea Scrolls discovery. This discovery might even contain the personal memoirs of many of the ancient biblical Patriarchs, including Benjamin, Joseph, Dan, Levi, Judah, Enoch, Noah, Abraham, Aaron and many more well known Old Testament names. Well . . . guess what? Now you can! Join Gary and Ken as they uncover Ken’s latest Dead Sea Scrolls research, a proverbial “Time Capsule” revealed just for our generation! Gary has called Ken’s new book, Ancient Testament of the Patriarchs, his very best work yet! Is it real? Can it be trusted? You be the judge!

item.title: Larry Ollison: The Fall of Lucifer
Mark Hitchcock: Can We Still Believe in the Rapture?
item.itunes:summary: One of the most controversial and misunderstood subjects in Christian circles today is the timing of the Lord’s return. Will the church be raptured before the Tribulation and be spared the wrath of God described in the book of Revelation? Will we endure some of God’s wrath as the “pre-wrath” crowd tell us? Or will we all die as martyrs for the cause of Christ? Pastor Mark Hitchcock has been a great defender of the rapture of the church for over 30 years. His calm, logical approach to defending this core doctrine of dispensationalism is always a breath of fresh air. Gary and Mark ask and answer the key question—can we still believe in the rapture?

item.title: Doug Hershey: The Rebirth of Israel
Billy Crone: The Seals of Revelation
item.itunes:summary: In the last 20 years, many Christians have moved away from solid dispensational Bible teaching. They have adopted unique new ways of interpreting several key Bible prophecies, specifically the ones that deal with the timing of the Rapture of the Church and the Tribulation Period. Many people are under the false assumption that the first three and a half years of the Tribulation are a time of peace and tranquility. Some are teaching that those first three and half years, when over 2 BILLION people die, represents the wrath of man, or even worse, the wrath of Satan! A new wave of Bible teachers are espousing the “pre-wrath” theory and the “6th-seal rapture theory,” believing God is going to put us through a time of persecution before we are raptured. Still others believe that the seals of Revelation have already been opened and we are already in the Tribulation! Passionate pastor, Billy Crone, was reduced to tears as he examined God’s wrath on an unbelieving world during the Tribulation period. Gary and Billy take a fresh look at the rapture of the Church and the Seals of Revelation, opening our eyes to the harsh reality of what lies ahead for our world. Get in the Ark before it’s too late!

item.title: Larry Ollison: The Paradise of God
item.itunes:summary: HEAVEN! It’s the hope of every Christian! Who doesn’t want to spend eternity with Jesus in a place He’s prepared just for us? Pastor and gifted communicator, Larry Ollison, sat down with Gary for a good old fashioned look into the future of Planet Earth, highlighted by a passionate discussion about our future home in the New Jerusalem. Can the complicated and sometimes frightening book of Revelation be decoded for the average believer? Can this end-times prophetic book be taken literally? Pastor Ollison lays out a last-days roadmap that cuts through all the prophetic confusion out there and takes us down the road all the way to Paradise. Be encouraged! Heaven awaits!

This was a blatant attempt by Satan to corrupt the bloodline of the Messiah. Many connect this sinful act of genetic rebellion against God with the worldwide, destructive flood of Noah. Columbia Law School graduate, Ryan Pitterson, spent 3 years of his life researching and writing the most comprehensive book on the Nephilim ever published—The Judgment of the Nephilim. Drawing on Scripture, little-known historical sources, and the writings of the ancient church fathers, Pitterson will take you places few have gone before. Join Gary and Ryan as they take a fresh look at this curious, but biblically-important subject!

item.title: Bill Salus: Psalm 83
Bill Salus: Psalm 83
item.itunes:summary: Bill Salus burst on the prophetic scene a few years ago with a focus on a handful of the Bible’s ancient, Old Testament prophecies. From his interpretation of the upcoming Psalm 83 War, to the Iranian, “Nuclear Boomerang” prophecies of Jeremiah 49, and then the “Doom of Damascus” prophecies in Isaiah 17 . . . Bill has developed quite a faithful following. And for good reason. He has a heart for the Gospel and the lost. Now, we may be standing on the verge of another area of Bill’s intense focus, the coming Russian/Iranian attack on Israel . . . the Battle of Gog and Magog. Only time will tell if we are there, but you will definitely want to hear what Gary and Bill have to say about the future! Inquiring minds want to know . . where does America fit in all of this turmoil and sabre rattling?

item.title: L.A. Marzulli: The Fatima Deception
item.itunes:summary: A century ago, on October 13, 1917, a bizarre event occurred in the tiny village of Fatima, Portugal. A shining female entity, who many locals believed to be the Virgin Mary, appeared repeatedly to three shepherd children. The children were told that a miracle would occur on that day and as 70,000 peasants stood in the pouring rain, the so-called Miracle of the Sun took place! The sun began to spin wildly in the sky like a kaleidoscope, then suddenly, it hurtled towards Earth! People began to confess their sins believing the end of the world was at hand! Automobiles stopped working, car-windshields exploded, gasoline ignited spontaneously and the hoods of cars were ripped off and thrown into the air! Leave it to the supernatural explorer, L.A. Marzulli, to blow the cover off this 100-year coverup. A “UFO” made an appearance that day and it was caught on camera, hidden directly beneath the sun. And now, after much detective work, Marzulli shares these original, untouched Fatima photographs, kept from the world for over 100 years!

item.title: Mark Hitchcock: Russia in Prophecy
Doug Hershey: Israel Rising, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: Thousands of years ago, the prophet Ezekiel foretold a future time in which the arid land of Israel would come alive for its people. Doug Hershey’s new breathtaking book documents the fulfillment of this vision, from the hills of Shiloh where shepherds once roamed; to the booming city of Tel Aviv, founded on sand dunes; to the stellar beaches of Caesarea, transformed from a small village into one of Israel’s most stunning coastal cities; and finally, Jerusalem, the Eternal City of Peace, where in ancient times the power of worship resounded from the Temple. Gary Stearman and Doug Hershey sit down to discuss this amazing transformation.

item.title: L.A. Marzulli: Goddess Worship
Bill Koenig: The Middle East Players
item.itunes:summary: There’s a familiar feeling of dread spreading across the Middle East. The drums of war are beating, with some new players joining the frenzied march to wipe out Israel and take over God’s holy city, Jerusalem. Arafat, Hafez al-Assad, King Hussein and Saddam Hussein are long gone, Now, it’s Putin, Erdogan, al-Assad, Rouhani, Abdullah, Netanyahu and President Trump, fighting for position on the world stage. How do all of these world leaders fit into Biblical prophecy and what’s next on the prophetic calendar? No one understands the complex Middle East cauldron like newsmaker Bill Koenig from Koenig’s International News. Follow Gary and Bill as they examine the prophecies of the Bible and try to uncover God’s next big move!

item.title: Larry Ollison: Understanding the Bible
Bill Koenig: Watching the Middle East
item.itunes:summary: There’s a cauldron boiling in the Middle East. The tiny, but powerful nation of Israel, the size of New Jersey, is surrounded by enemies who are threatening her with complete annihilation. The Palestinians gather on Israel’s border by the thousands, violently demanding their own independent state. Russia has partnered up with Syria and is now threatening Israel and the United States with its military might. Iran makes no secret of its intentions, threatening Israel and America with naval warfare and a future that may include nuclear weapons. Who would understand the convoluted, Middle East mess better than Bill Koenig, the prophetic news-tracker who thousands of people rely on for daily breaking news from Israel each day? Tune in to see what’s next on God’s prophetic calendar! War? Peace? A two-state solution? The destruction of Damascus? Ezekiel’s Gog and Magog War? As President Trump prepares to move the US Embassy to Jerusalem in May, “prophecy watchers” would be wise to listen to Gary and Bill discuss the signs of the times!

item.title: Doug Hershey: The Land of Israel
Ken Johnson: Ancient Prophecies Revealed
item.itunes:summary: Unknown to most of the world, the ancient prophecies of the Bible, many of them over 2,700 years old, contain the road map to the future. Hundreds of prophecies have come to pass already, with many more just over the horizon. With the Middle East on the verge of a prophetic implosion, we’re paying close attention to the claims of Scripture. How could God prove to the world that he is God, without showing up in person? The late Dave Hunt once said, “Whoever wrote the Bible knows the future . . . which leaves us with two choices. The author of the Bible is either a highly advanced space alien, or He’s exactly who the Bible says He is, Almighty God!” It’s up to you to decide just who He is, in fact, your eternal future depends on it. Gary Stearman and Ken Johnson sit down to discuss a few of the 500 important end-time prophecies that we believe confirm the inerrancy of the Scriptures.

item.title: Ken Johnson: The Trustworthiness of God
Billy Crone: Prepping for Eternity
item.itunes:summary: There is a real sense of urgency among students of Bible prophecy these days. The daily news headlines verify the ancient prophecies of the Bible in a way that would make you think “Someone” knew the future and wrote about it in advance! There’s even a little-known biblical reference to “fake news” in the last days! But not everyone is paying close attention. While people spend millions of dollars on fortune tellers and palm readers, trying to learn about their future, passionate pastor, Billy Crone, explains that their future and the future of the world revolve around the ancient biblical prophecies. It’s hard to keep up with all of the prophetic signs of the times, but Gary and Billy will fill you in on many of the latest advancements as we approach the rapture of the church and the Tribulation. Are you prepared for eternity?

item.itunes:summary: It’s never happened before in the history of the world. Isaiah 66:8 says, “Can a nation be born in a day?” Why yes it can! Scattered to the four corners of the Earth in 70 AD, the tiny fledgling nation of Israel, brought back from total ruin, returned to their Promised Land on May 14, 1948, serving as supernatural proof of God’s Divine hand and protection. The word miracle sounds almost trivial, but once you hear Gary Stearman and Gary Frazier talk about “The Miracle of Israel,” you will gain a new understanding and appreciation for the prophecies of the Bible and the Land of Israel.

item.title: Bill Koenig: Presidents and Prophecy
item.itunes:summary: The prophet Daniel says that it is God who changes the times and epochs of history. He removes kings and establishes kings. He gives wisdom to wise men and knowledge to men of understanding. Gary Stearman and White House correspondent Bill Koenig take a look at our recent leaders and the recent course they have set for America. Have they proved to be wise and knowledgable men of understanding? Dividing the Land of Israel? Bathing the White House in the colors of the rainbow? Claiming that America is no longer a Christian nation and catering to Islam? How should a Christian react to this “legacy?” And what will become of this nation if we continue on a course that denies biblical wisdom?

item.title: Paul McGuire: Mass Awakening
item.itunes:summary: The “New World Order” phrase has become commonplace in today’s society. Is there a shadow government that operates behind the scenes and secretly runs our country? With over $19 TRILLION in national debt, where is America headed? A complete collapse? A reset button? Or could this be a pre-planned and carefully orchestrated destruction? Will a worldwide financial collapse bring about an end-times scenario straight out of the pages of the Bible, ushering in the last-days system of the Antichrist? Paul McGuire makes his first-ever appearance on Prophecy Watchers and looks at “things to come” in the 2016/2017 years.

item.title: Tom Hughes: Why Israel?
item.itunes:summary: I’m sure you’ve heard the old Jewish adage directed to God, “If we’re the Chosen People, choose someone else!” So we ask the question, “what’s so special about Israel? Why did God choose the Jewish people to bring salvation to the world through Jesus? And why is Jerusalem this special place favored by God? Just yesterday we were accused of being anti-Semitic for suggesting the Tribulation Period is all about Israel. Yet the Bible indicates that one day, perhaps very soon, Israel will be surrounded by the armies of the world, facing complete annihilation at Armageddon. Are the people living in Israel today God’s Chosen People? Or just imposters as some people claim? Gary and Pastor Tom Hughes answer the tough question, “Why Israel?”

item.title: Tom Hughes: America in the New World Order
item.itunes:summary: Where does America fit into the end-times prophecies of the Bible? Were we a special nation chosen by God for the last days? As the moral character of our nation deteriorates, will judgment soon follow? How does the Illuminati fit into the picture—were we a nation founded on a conspiracy? And what part does America play in the future Gog and Magog war? California Pastor Tom Hughes takes a look at America’s past and looks at her future through the eyes of the prophets. He ties our past and our future in with the nation of Israel—and looks at the future of both nations uniquely blessed by God.

item.title: Ron Rhodes: Understanding Revelation
Rabbi Menachem Kohen: Prophecies for the Era of Muslim Terror
Ron Rhodes: The Prophecies of Daniel
item.itunes:summary: The book that bears the Old Testament prophet’s name, Daniel, drives liberals crazy! From the carefully crafted words and detailed future prophecies, it appears that Daniel was a “Time Traveler” and could see into the future! Imagine that! Critics claim the book of Daniel was written after certain events already happened, but we’re not buying it. It took Gary and best-selling author Ron Rhodes all of 5 seconds to strike a chord and become best friends, studying one of their favorite books together. The 70 Weeks of Daniel, Nebuchadnezzar’s dream, the Antichrist, the Fiery Furnace, the Handwriting on the Wall—this was an exciting program!

item.title: Aaron Judkins & Michael McDaniel: The Alien Agenda
item.itunes:summary: What’s a Christian supposed to think about UFOs? Are they government experiments gone awry from WW II? Are they demons entering and exiting the dimensional veil? How do the Sphinx, the Cherubim and the Nephilim enter the equation? Are they all interconnected? What better combination can we offer but a trained archaeologist, Aaron Judkins, a gifted writer and thinker—and one who was present on L.A. Marzulli’s recent skull-hunting trip to Peru. And Pastor Michael McDaniel, a gifted thinker, writer and Bible scholar. Will the Nephilim return? Will they explain away the Rapture? Is the Great Pyramid a Stargate to another dimension? Where does the Antichrist fit into the picture? Will he be superhuman? Tune in for some fascinating conversation!

item.title: Michael Lake: The Shinar Directive, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: “Viewer Warning: This may be one of the most fascinating programs you have ever seen! Gary and Dr. Michael Lake explore his book, The Shinar Directive, an explosive book that details those things you will NEVER hear in church. Watcher technology, the ancient city of Shinar, the real occult agenda behind the Tower of Babel and the leader of this anti-God rebellion—Nimrod, a man who evolved into “a gibborim.” Seeking ancient technology from the fallen angels after the flood, the people of Nimrod’s day refused to be victims of a flood again! They built a massive wall around Shinar, an excavated city the size of London! Masonic symbolism reigns in the dark world of the occult—a world in which Dr. Lake and his family are all too familiar! Don’t miss this program! An all-time classic! Take a look behind the curtain!”

item.title: Gary Stearman: The Importance of Prophecy
item.itunes:summary: The biggest prophecy conference in the USA kicks off this next week, July 15-17, 2016. Featuring 27 speakers of the top names in the world of Bible prophecy, the 1st annual Rocky Mountain International Prophecy Conference offers something for everyone. Prophecy, evangelism, transhumanism, robotics and super-soldiers, the supernatural, biblical archaeology, the upcoming Presidential election—the upcoming war in the Middle East—it’s a smorgasbord of fascinating information. Gary and Bob talk about the speakers, many who only require a single name—Stearman, Horn, Gilbert, Marzulli, Koenig, Price, Missler, Lipkin, Farah, Richardson, Deyo, Salus, Putnam, McGuire and 13 more! A few event tickets still remain, but LIVE STREAMING provides access to 75% of the entire conference!

item.title: Ken Johnson: Biblical Dreams and Visions
item.itunes:summary: Dreams and visions . . . Just those words alone will spark immediate controversy! But yet the Bible is full of spectacular accounts of God using this method of communication to send a clear message. Who can forget Joseph, Pharaoh’s personal dream interpreter? Or the dream that sent Mary and Joseph fleeing to Egypt? Pilate’s wife had a dream she’ll never forget while Abraham, Gideon, Isaiah, Ezekiel, Zechariah, Jeremiah and the Magi all experienced some very unusual encounters. Leave it to Gary Stearman and Ken Johnson to take a bizarre and controversial subject and add the Scriptural underpinnings to this method of Godly communication. Does God still work through dreams and visions today? Soon you shall know!

item.title: Bill Salus: The Coming Global Transformation
item.itunes:summary: Bill Salus has captured the attention of prophecy students with his unique take on Psalm 83, Iran’s nuclear program and eventual destruction, and most recently, The NOW Prophecies. But what about the unique work he helped create a few years back, a 3-hour MP3 Audio CD that weaves all of the “last-days” prophecies into a fascinating, end-times scenario, laying out the possibility that a sudden, unexplainable UFO appearance and a subsequent war in the Middle East might explain away the Rapture of the church! This “Coming Global Transformation” could happen at any moment—perhaps tonight! Will the “little green men” be friendly? Will they introduce the world to “their leader.” Can there by any doubt that a great deception lies just ahead?

Watcher technology, the ancient city of Shinar, the real occult agenda behind the Tower of Babel and the leader of this anti-God rebellion—Nimrod, a man who evolved into “a gibborim.” Seeking ancient technology from the fallen angels after the flood, the people of Nimrod’s day refused to be victims of a flood again! They built a massive wall around Shinar, an excavated city the size of London! Masonic symbolism reigns in the dark world of the occult—a world in which Dr. Lake and his family are all too familiar! Don’t miss this program! An all-time classic! Take a look behind the curtain!”

item.title: Gary Stearman: The Pentecost Prophecy
item.itunes:summary: The two-day Feast of Pentecost arrives in just a few days, June 11-13. It offers a remarkable shadow and type of the Rapture of the Church in so many different ways. The Church of course was birthed on a Pentecost. The Jewish people believe that Pentecost is the day the fruit of the trees is judged! King David was born and died on Pentecost. According to tradition, Enoch was born and then raptured on Pentecost! The Law was given at Mt Sinai on Pentecost and 3,000 people died. Peter preached the Gospel on Pentecost and 3,000 people were saved! It’s no coincidence—a perfect picture of Law and Grace! Gary and Bob discuss this important day on God’s calendar and wonder—will the Church be raptured on a future Pentecost?

item.title: Aaron Judkins and Bruce Hall: Finding Noah
item.itunes:summary: Noah’s Ark. Just those two famous words conjure up all sorts of mental images and endless quests for adventure. Enter Bible-believing archaeologist Aaron Judkins and his team of explorers, braving 30-degrees below zero temperatures, treacherous ice-covered canyons, the threat of terrorists and wild dogs, and the ominous and legendary 17,000 foot-high Mt. Ararat! Once they take out their chainsaws and start cutting through the ice searching for what they believed were the remains of the Ark, you’ll be hooked on their adventure! Join Gary Stearman, Aaron Judkins and Bruce Hall as they search for a relic that could change the world’s view of the Bible forever! Will the Ark be found in our lifetime?

item.title: Bill Salus: America’s Spiritual Indictment
item.itunes:summary: Is the United States of America doomed? Are we now in God’s crosshairs, ripe for end-times judgment? In the last few years we have witnessed an astonishing transformation of our country, as we drift towards perversions of every kind, blatantly shaking our fist in God’s face. Will God hear and answer our prayers for this increasingly wayward nation? The evidence is troubling. Abortion and the Planned Parenthood scandal, the LGBT movement, genetic manipulation, Islamic insurgence, persecution of Christians for their beliefs . . . what can a God-fearing believer do about this mess? Gary Stearman and Bill Salus take a look at the impending disaster and the hand of judgment that must surely be awaiting our country. Have we crossed over the line with no turning back?

item.title: Jeff Kinley: Christian Zombie Killers
item.itunes:summary: Has Prophecy Watchers entered the zombie craze that seems to have infected the world of television and movies? Hardly. Combining zombies with dispensationalism isn’t an easy thing to do, but Gary Stearman and gifted author Jeff Kinley take this bizarre subject and turn it into an inspiring message. Sadly, the evil zombie spirit has infected us all—the Bible calls it mankind’s sin nature. The good news? God’s grace and His gift of salvation through Jesus Christ provides the cure!

item.title: Tommy Ice: The Pre-Trib Rapture
item.itunes:summary: It may be the most controversial subject in Christendom today—the rapture of the Church. It’s a critical Bible doctrine that has its share of skeptics and bashers. Will be whisked up to heaven by Jesus “in the twinkling of an eye,” or will we be left behind to face the Antichrist, endure a 7-year Tribulation, and face a certain death? We’ve brought in the A-Team for this fascinating subject—Gary Stearman and prophecy legend Thomas Ice, the Executive Director of the Pre-Trib Research Center. And what a conversation they had! Better put on your deep thinking cap. These guys address the issues with logic and Scripture and defend the Blessed Hope!

item.title: Jim and Penny Caldwell: Exploring Arabia’s Sinai, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: The exodus of the Israelites from Egypt conjures up images of Pharaoh, the parting of the Red Sea, and the mountain where God gave us the Ten Commandments. Maybe one day someone will make a movie out of such a fantastic story! Who would think that a couple of weekend adventurers would play such an important part in the story? Enter Jim and Penny Caldwell, a couple who spent many a vacation clandestinely exploring the Sinai desert—camera in hand. What they discovered on their journeys is the stuff of legend. Remember the split rock Moses struck to quench the thirst of perhaps a million Israelites? Or the altar of the Golden Calf? Or the Cave of Elijah? Or the actual mountain of God—Mt. Sinai? Perhaps you’ve seen some of the amazing pictures—these places have all been discovered and photographed—by the Caldwell’s! You are going to love these people and their story!

item.title: Gary Stearman: Elijah is Coming!
item.itunes:summary: The last few verses of the Old Testament carry a fascinating message from the Old Testament prophet Malachi. He says that God will send the prophet Elijah BEFORE the great and terrible Day of the Lord. Since Elijah is on the Earth for the first 3.5 years of the Tribulation, we believe his words are yet another clear proof-text that the Rapture of the Church ends the Church Age. Is Elijah alive on planet Earth today? Is there a lengthy interval between the Rapture and the start of the Tribulation? Gary and Bob discuss this ancient Messianic prophecy, written almost 2,500 years ago, yet still celebrated and desired by the Jewish people even today.

item.title: Bill Salus: The NOW Prophecies
L.A. Marzulli: The Biblical Seed War
item.itunes:summary: You won’t hear about this in your church on Sunday morning. Most Christians know nothing about this subject. Fortunately Gary Stearman and guest L.A Marzulli are world renowned experts on this subject. The battle started a long time ago in the Garden of Eden. God created Adam and Eve in His own image but the fallen angel Lucifer had plans of his own. Leaving their home in heaven these fallen angels attempted to change the DNA of man forever by intermingling angelic seed with human seed. It may sound far fetched to even consider such a wild scheme, but these half-human hybrids created havoc on Earth. A few hundred years after they appeared, God destroyed all life on Planet Earth with a worldwide flood. Every living thing died with the exception of Noah and his family, found “pure” in their generation. Learn all about the “SEED WAR” between God and Satan.

item.title: Bill Salus: The NOW Prophecies, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: Do you believe the Lord still works through dreams and visions? Bill Salus does. A few months ago Bill awoke in the middle of the night after hearing these words in a dream—The Now Prophecies. Bill was convinced it was a message straight from God. As the thought of going back to sleep crossed his mind, his cell phone rang. It was a call from somewhere in Africa and they didn’t speak a word of English! Wide awake now, Bill took it as a sign and he began writing like he never had before—in complete seclusion for 4 straight months! As things come to a head in the Middle East, the nations of the world seem poised once again for battle. Israel, Russia, Syria, Iran, Egypt, Saudi Arabia, Jordan and the USA . . . are we about to see World War 3? Is this the season? Are Psalm 83, Ezekiel 38, Isaiah 17 and Jeremiah 49 about to be fulfilled in rapid fire succession? These are most certainly the NOW Prophecies.

item.title: Tom Hughes and Bill Salus: The NOW Prophecies, Part 2
Tom Hughes and Bill Salus: The NOW Prophecies, Part 1
Tim Alberino: True Legends, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: Most of us are familiar with the biblical account of the fallen angels in Genesis 6. These angels “left their first estate” and produced gigantic, hybrid offspring with human women, men of renown as Scripture calls them. But where are their bones today? Where is the evidence of these giants who made the Israelites feel like “grasshoppers” when they entered the Promised Land? What became of the “10-footers” that used to be housed in museums across the world? These megalithic men left behind advanced technology and gigantic architectural wonders . . . if you know where to look. Enter Nephilim explorer, Timothy Alberino, part of Steve Quayle’s new investigative team of film makers. His recent trips to Peru uncovered more fabulous evidence of a worldwide coverup. Why is this subject so important? It’s a heated battle for the seed of mankind. It’s a war between God and Satan and mankind is caught in the middle! Just as in the days of Noah! In part one of a two-part interview, Gary and Tim explore the physical evidence on Tim’s DVD, True Legends.

item.title: L.A. Marzulli: Giants in the Holy Land
item.itunes:summary: The Bible contains some strange events, but none stranger than the angelic rebellion described in Genesis 6. For the third time, “the experts” gathered in Newark, Ohio for the annual Nephilim Mounds conference. Gary Stearman, L.A. Marzulli, Russ Dizdar, Fritz Zimmerman and Chief Joseph Riverwind spoke passionately about these dark days—the days of Noah and how this tragic “seed war” brought about the flood that destroyed every living creature on the planet. When the Israelites entered the Promised Land there was a challenge waiting—the offspring of those fallen angels—the gigantic Nephilim. Some say you can’t fully understand the Bible without an understanding of this controversial and bizarre subject. These five men would no doubt agree.

Are Psalm 83, Ezekiel 38, Isaiah 17 and Jeremiah 49 about to be fulfilled in rapid fire succession? These are most certainly the NOW Prophecies.

item.title: Tim Mahoney: Patterns of Evidence, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: The reactions to Tim Mahoney’s feature film, Patterns of Evidence, have been explosive. Seeing the remains of the excavated palace of Joseph, his pyramid-shaped tomb with his own life-sized statue (wearing a painted-on coat of many colors!) and the excavated, memorialized graves for his brothers is too much for liberal theologians and skeptics to handle. What if the professionals, the Egyptologists who deny the Exodus, got it all wrong? What if this Christian filmmaker’s timeline for the Israelite’s escape from Egypt answered all of their objections? Mahoney’s film is mesmerizing. Christians should be excited, seeing the hand of God at work in the lives of His people Israel. Gary and Tim present “Part Two” of an exciting interview—a fascinating and unexpected new archaeological discovery.

item.title: Tim Alberino: True Legends
item.itunes:summary: Most of us are familiar with the biblical account of the fallen angels in Genesis 6. These angels “left their first estate” and produced gigantic, hybrid offspring with human women, men of renown as Scripture calls them. But where are their bones today? Where is the evidence of these giants who made the Israelites feel like “grasshoppers” when they entered the Promised Land? What became of the “10-footers” that used to be housed in museums across the world? These megalithic men left behind advanced technology and gigantic architectural wonders . . . if you know where to look. Enter Nephilim explorer, Timothy Alberino, part of Steve Quayle’s new investigative team of film makers. His recent trips to Peru uncovered more fabulous evidence of a worldwide coverup. Why is this subject so important? It’s a heated battle for the seed of mankind. It’s a war between God and Satan and mankind is caught in the middle! Just as in the days of Noah! In part one of a two-part interview, Gary and Tim explore the physical evidence on Tim’s DVD, True Legends.

item.title: Gary Stearman: The Nuclear Destruction of Egypt
item.itunes:summary: Who can ever forget what happened to Pharaoh and his army when they pursued the Israelites across the Red Sea? There’s a little-known, overlooked prophecy in the book of Ezekiel that predicts a tragic end to the nation of Egypt. Scripture says that Egypt becomes uninhabitable for 40 years! What could bring such devastating destruction? The prophet references a structure called The Tower of Syene in his writings, a full 2,500 years before it ever existed! This should convince you that God knows the future! What if we told you that this Russian-constructed monument, perhaps to Islam, sits in the shadow of the Nile River? And right next to the Aswan Dam! If a nuclear weapon were to destroy this massive structure, trillions of gallons of water would flood Egypt. Will the long-time enemies of Israel be destroyed by water once again? Gary and Bob take a deep look at this ancient prophecy.

item.title: Tim Mahoney: Patterns of Evidence
item.itunes:summary: The majority of Egyptologists would tell you loudly and clearly that the Exodus never happened. Just a Jewish fairy tale. Not a single shred of historical or archaeological proof. Claiming that the Israelites departure from Egypt actually happened the way the Bible describes it is a good way to get ostracized by the academic community. Enter filmmaker Timothy Mahoney and his ground-breaking book and film, Patterns of Evidence. Mahoney’s film leaves little doubt that these archaeologists are looking in the wrong place—at the wrong time. Mahoney’s new timeline exposes the shortcomings of archaeological tradition and unearths spectacular evidence—literally. Just wait until you see the excavated statue of Joseph wearing—ready for this?—a painted on coat of many colors! Great film! The best news? A sequel is in the works! A real biblical faith builder!

item.title: Join Us in Jerusalem: Ben Yehuda Street
Tom Horn & Joe Ardis Horn: Inhuman, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: Tom Horn is back in a BIG way. His new ground-breaking documentary on transhumanism, INHUMAN, is absolutely shocking—controversial enough to get one banned from television! Tom brought a bizarre “prop” to the program—an actual human, gene-altering laboratory kit that enables one to change one’s own DNA! This CRISPR kit and the technology behind it screams “days of Noah” and the bizarre events the Bible describes in Genesis chapter 6. Sci-Fi takes on new meaning as Tom and Joe Ardis let us see what’s behind “Door Number 3.” Cloning . . . genetic modification of human embryos . . . experiments with plants and animals . . . throw ethics out the window—we’ve entered a new world—a world of super-humans, chimeras, super-soldiers, or perhaps a new variety of Nephilim! Pandemonium has arrived!

item.title: Bill Koenig: Eye to Eye, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: White House news correspondent, Bill Koenig, the founder of Koenig’s World Watch Daily news service, can hardly keep up with all the biblically significant events happening around the world. Fulfilled prophecy is now front and center in the USA, Israel, Russia, Syria, Iran, China and Europe. After distributing tens of thousands of his ground-breaking Eye to Eye books—many to US Congressmen and Senators, Bill has finally turned his unique research into a brand new, magnificent DVD! Is God watching over Israel? Are individual nations punished by God for betraying His chosen people and attempting to divide “The Land?” What’s next on God’s prophetic calendar? This is a must-see interview!

item.title: Tom Hughes: We Three Kings
item.itunes:summary: There are a series of great stories hidden deep within the Christmas story. Leave it to Gary and energetic, California Pastor Tom Hughes to dig out the gems and deliver a great Christmas gift for our friends. Think you know all of the Bible’s intricate details about the birth of Christ? Prepare to be surprised! After the program, Gary described it as his favorite Christmas program of all time! Merry Christmas! Joy to the world—the Lord is coming!

item.title: Avi Lipkin: The Mystery of ISIS
item.itunes:summary: Terror has gripped the Middle East, Europe and now America as we acknowledge the existence of a new enemy—ISIS, or as our President calls them, ISIL. They seemingly came out of nowhere, committing atrocities that boggle the imagination. Who are they and where did they come from? Where do they fit into Bible prophecy? Will they invade Israel in the future? Gary and Israeli insider Avi Lipkin explore the roots of this end-time Islamic terror brigade in a way few people really understand. Will America continue down the path of appeasement and political correctness? Or will America submit and become as Avi has predicted, “A Muslim nation?”

item.title: Ken Johnson: The Church Age
item.itunes:summary: Many prophetic theologians believe the “Church Age” is almost over. It was a mystery to the early church and it remains a mystery to most Christians today. Will this 2,000 year interlude result in the soon return of Jesus Christ? When exactly are the 2,000 years up? Leave it to Gary Stearman and Bible scholar-extraordinaire, Dr. Ken Johnson, to unravel the ramifications of living in the final moments of this mysterious time period, described cryptically in the book of Zechariah. The biblical nuggets come fast and furious as Gary and Ken explore the writings of the ancient church fathers in the book of Barnabas and other relatively unknown writings. Ken’s unique view on the rapture, the 6 day, 6,000 year plan and many other little-known prophecies will leave you wanting more!

item.title: Ken Johnson: The Prophetic Timeline
item.itunes:summary: The prophet Daniel tends to infuriate liberal skeptics. And for good reason. God has built a calculator into his Word and Daniel understood it long before the rest of the world. For starters, he predicted the exact date of the Messiah’s arrival. Next, through careful Bible study, he arrived at exact date of Israel’s rebirth as a nation. Then he predicted, to the day, the moment Israel recaptured Jerusalem and the Temple Mount! So what does Daniel have to say about the start of the Tribulation? Hmm . . . better pay close attention to Ken Johnson’s fascinating interview and DVD.

item.title: L.A. Marzulli: Days of Chaos, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: Is there a better way to describe our world today than “The Days of Chaos.” Prophecy expert and the co-creator of the Watchers DVD series, L.A. Marzulli, is back with his latest hard-hitting docu-drama, bringing us the inside scoop on things happening behind the scenes—things mostly kept hidden from the public. What’s the real story behind the Planned Parenthood debacle? You may not want to see it. Did Richard Shaw’s cinematography talents uncover enhanced footage of the occupants of the UFO featured in Watchers 8? Do the rabbis have a Torah Code update on the coming Messiah? And what’s killing the bee population? Tune in and watch L.A. leap from one fascinating subject to another!

item.title: Jeff Kinley: As It Was in the Days of Noah
item.itunes:summary: We’ve all heard the fantastic Biblical account of Noah’s Ark. But what’s really going on behind the scenes? What could possibly motivate a loving God to destroy His entire creation, save 8 souls who rebuilt the world’s population? The story is far more fantastic than most Christians could ever imagine. Gary and talented author Jeff Kinley lay out the shocking events surrounding the “days of Noah,” and compare those days to the rapidly approaching end times. The Bible says that the last days will be just like those dark days before the flood. Are we there?

Marzulli, is back with his latest hard-hitting docu-drama, bringing us the inside scoop on things happening behind the scenes—things mostly kept hidden from the public. What’s the real story behind the Planned Parenthood debacle? You may not want to see it. Did Richard Shaw’s cinematography talents uncover enhanced footage of the occupants of the UFO featured in Watchers 8? Do the rabbis have a Torah Code update on the coming Messiah? And what’s killing the bee population? Tune in and watch L.A. leap from one fascinating subject to another!

item.title: Gary Stearman: The Master Mathematician
item.itunes:summary: The intricate design of the Bible was no accident. The 66 books we have in the Old and New Testaments are the 66 books God wanted us to have. Gary and Bob talk about the amazing numerical discoveries of two mathematical marvels, Chuck Missler and James Harrison. Their detailed studies on biblical mathematics prove that the whole of Scripture is an engineered, coordinated feat outside of time and space—a look into eternity that may never be fully understood this side of heaven. Codes, ciphers, enigmas, Torah Codes, Yeshua Codes—it’s all in here. Prepare to be be amazed by God’s extraordinary effort to convince even the most hardened skeptic that the Bible is exactly what it says it is—a gift from the Master Mathematician!

item.title: Gary Stearman: Years of Seven
item.itunes:summary: In 2017 Israel will celebrate some mathematically memorable dates. It’s the 120 year anniversary of the first Zionist Congress; the 100 year anniversary of the Balfour Declaration; the 70 year anniversary of the UN Mandate setting up the Jewish State; and the 50 year anniversary of the 1967 war and the recapture of the Temple Mount. Is this all just a coincidence? Or is the Master Mathematician sending us a message? Gary and Bob discuss a recent article by Gary—Years of Seven—and explain the logic behind dispensational theology and the 6-day 6,000-year plan for man. Is time about to run out on this world? Where are we on God’s timepiece?

item.title: Brent Miller: A Witness to the World
item.itunes:summary: Brent Miller Sr., co-producer of the award-winning DVD, The Final Prophecies, has an offer that’s pretty hard to refuse. There’s a FREE COPY of the Final Prophecies DVD waiting just for you, courtesy of Ingenuity Films. Brent’s DVD is quite simply the finest prophetic DVD ever produced. Millions of people have already seen it and for good reason. The cinematography is spectacular! The biblical archaeology is fascinating! And what a fantastic witnessing tool! When was the last time you found yourself at the base of the Temple Mount in Jerusalem, examining the Roman destruction from 70 AD? Or on the shores of the Red Sea, trying to envision the pathway of the Israelites out of Egypt? Brent will even take you to “underground Jerusalem” to see places most of us will never see in our lifetime. 90 minutes of fast-paced, fascinating action—a treasure worth having—and worth sharing!

item.title: Gary Stearman: Your Heavenly Reward
item.itunes:summary: One of these days, we’re all going to meet Jesus. Will you be ready for that appointment with destiny? Or are you dreading that moment? Do you find yourself caught up in the cares of this world, in need of a spiritual pick-me-up? Gary and Bob, along with author C.J. Lovik, want to help and encourage you to prepare to meet the King. What exactly does the Bible mean by the words eternal rest? Do harps and clouds come to mind? And is heaven an equal opportunity employer? Will all Christians be treated the same? Or will some have “better jobs?” Take a look at your future!

item.title: Brent Miller: Fire from the Sky
item.itunes:summary:
Signs in the heavens are all the rage today. We’ve all heard about the 4 Blood Moons, but there is another MAJOR sign in the heavens that no one is talking about. No one but the producer of The Final Prophecies, Brent Miller. You are about to get an advanced education into the events of the Tribulation Period—things you have NEVER heard before.
The Bible mentions fire from heaven and says that Satan returns with God-like powers—lying signs and wonders. Something secret is in the works. Governments of the world are creating seed vaults that are being protected by armed guards. Underground cities are being constructed all over the world. NORAD is making preparations for . . . something. What do they know that we don’t? Is there a natural electro-magnetic pulse event coming? Will there be an electronic attack from a rogue nation? Is the world about to experience the most outrageous moment in time since Noah’s Flood and be sent back to the Dark Ages?

item.title: Brent Miller: The Coming Pole Shift
item.itunes:summary: There’s a bizarre passage in Isaiah 24:20 that says, “The Earth shall reel to and fro like a drunkard.” What exactly does that mean? Ingenuity Films co-producer, Brent Miller Sr., the producer of The Final Prophecies and Decoding the Future DVDs, suggests a future geographical pole shift, where chaos reigns and mountains fall into the sea. Tribulation time! He also connects this with the passage that says, “No man knows the day or the hour,” suggestive of a possible change in the times and seasons. I’ve heard Brent preach this message before and have seen people walking out shaking their heads in disbelief. You’ve never heard anything like this before!

item.title: Bill Salus: The Prophetic Timeline, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: Strange events are in the air in Iran, Israel and the USA. The Obama administration is attempting to fast track an Iranian nuclear agreement through Congress, opening wide Pandora’s Nuclear Box for a country that supports terrorism worldwide, and names the US and Israel as their biggest enemies—countries they’d prefer be annihilated! What’s wrong with this picture? Enter Bill Salus, author of Nuclear Showdown in Iran: The Ancient Prophecy of Elam. Bill has a prophetic angle on their future and he’ll bring you up to speed on this brewing battle in the Middle East—and God’s clear answer from the pages of the Bible!

item.title: Bill Salus: The Prophetic Timeline, Part 1
item.itunes:summary: Bill Salus has become the voice of authority on many of the events heading our way in September. Blood moons, Shemitah cycles, Wars in the Middle East, Iran’s nuclear program—we’re all on edge waiting to see if these are orchestrated events, or just a series of random coincidences. What IS going to happen? He joined with two very familiar names—Jonathan Cahn and Mark Biltz, to create an exceptional DVD, Out of the Mouth of Two Witnesses: Signs From the Heavens. Perhaps Bill’s DVD can be used to alert a lost friend or family member of the rapid escalation of end time events. It’s powerful. Are we at the very end of days?

item.title: Doug Stauffer: Salvation in the Tribulation
item.itunes:summary: The investigative team of Stearman and Stauffer is back, examining yet another controversial end-times subject. After the rapture of the church, when Christians are removed from planet Earth, will people who have heard the Gospel and rejected it still be able to receive God’s gift of salvation? Are they permanently disqualified from receiving Christ? Will the Holy Spirit still be active during the Tribulation? Will there be a great revival “after the rapture?” Or will people be tricked into believing “the lie?”

item.title: L.A. Marzulli: The Biblical Giants
item.itunes:summary: The 3rd annual Nephilim Mounds Conference is just 5 weeks away—it’s scheduled for September 12th and 13th in Newark, Ohio. Gary Stearman and L.A. Marzulli, two of the guest speakers, discuss this one-of-a-kind conference and the bizarre subject of the ancient Nephilim, the offspring of the rebellious fallen angels and the women of Earth. While this may be a controversial, uncomfortable and over-the-top subject to many, Genesis 6 is pretty clear—this horrific event really happened. Is there a better explanation for the flood of Noah and the virtual annihilation of the human race?

item.title: Doug Stauffer: After The Rapture
item.itunes:summary: Stearman and Stauffer. No, they’re not a law firm, but they are two great defenders of the faith and the pre-tribulation rapture. Gary and Doug are “looking for that blessed hope” like no two people I know. They will encourage you to Godly living and have you looking for the Lord’s soon return. Answering the tough questions, these two eager researchers discuss the “Last Trump,” Dispensationalism, the Day of the Lord, the Pre-Wrath rapture and the Mark of the Beast. A good old fashioned prophecy program! Watch it.

item.title: Avi Lipkin: Islamic Rivalry Part 2
item.itunes:summary: Gary called his recent interviews with Avi Lipkin some of the most powerful interviews he’s ever done. Avi takes a look at America and sees the leadership of our country moving closer and closer to a relationship with Islam. Avi is usually way ahead of the news media, and he provides a startling update on the coming fall of the Saudi Kingdom. Will ISIS conquer the Middle East, come ashore in America, and then look towards the Promised Land? Avi is no prophet, but he’s been right before! Don’t miss this interview!

item.title: Avi Lipkin: Islamic Rivalry
item.itunes:summary: Israeli insider, Avi Lipkin, is usually way ahead of the curve. During a recent visit with Gary, he took a look at ISIS and their violent march across the Middle East. They aren’t going away any time soon. They have their eyes on Jordan and then Saudi Arabia. Can they be stopped? Soon they will control all of the territory surrounding the Land of Israel. Will Israel do battle with ISIS soon?

item.title: Billy Crone: Mark of the Beast
item.itunes:summary: Only in this age of high-technology could the “Mark of the Beast” be implemented successfully. The Bible says that during the Tribulation no man can buy or sell without the dreaded mark. Will you be here to take “the mark” in your right hand or your forehead? Will it doom you to a lifetime in hell? Or, as some Christian theologians are now suggesting, will you get a second chance? Billy Crone offers his latest advanced research on one of the hottest subjects in Christianity. Will R.F.I.D. technology be the high-tech tool that enslaves the whole world? Hear about the very latest prophetic developments in this bizarre, people-tracking world.

item.title: Cris Putnam: Supernatural Worldview
item.itunes:summary: Cris Putnam has a testimony that will send shivers down your spine. One day, on the brink of suicide, he heard a voice that clearly said “The cemetery or the seminary.” Fortunately for us, Cris chose the latter. His book, The Supernatural Worldview, covers a myriad of subjects, one more fascinating than the last. Spoon-bending psychokinesis parties? ESP training? Ghosts and demons; heaven and hell; poltergeists and near-death experiences; shocking, verifiable medical miracles—The powers of heaven and the powers of darkness are real! What a fascinating interview!

item.title: Tom Horn & Cris Putnam: On the Path of the Immortals, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: We were introduced to Tom Horn through his fascinating book, Nephilim Stargates. The possibility of “stargate portals”—pathways to another dimension, seemed bizarre at the time, but perhaps the book of Enoch is accurate. Enoch claims that fallen angels left their home in heaven and traveled to another dimension—Planet Earth, landing on Mt Hermon and creating the genetic nightmare of Genesis 6. Tom has done it again with co-author Cris Putnam, penning a new book, The Immortals, and revealing the strange secrets of the CERN Large Hadron Collider. Tom and Cris suggest that perhaps there is a plan underway to open up a new portal to another dimension—a parallel universe. Are there intelligent beings waiting on the other side? Or a nightmare for humanity?
item.description: We were introduced to Tom Horn through his fascinating book, Nephilim Stargates. The possibility of “stargate portals”—pathways to another dimension, seemed bizarre at the time, but perhaps the book of Enoch is accurate. Enoch claims that fallen angels left their home in heaven and traveled to another dimension—Planet Earth, landing on Mt Hermon and creating the genetic nightmare of Genesis 6. Tom has done it again with co-author Cris Putnam, penning a new book, The Immortals, and revealing the strange secrets of the CERN Large Hadron Collider. Tom and Cris suggest that perhaps there is a plan underway to open up a new portal to another dimension—a parallel universe. Are there intelligent beings waiting on the other side? Or a nightmare for humanity?

item.title: Gary Stearman: The Pentecost Prophecy
item.itunes:summary: Pentecost is the most mysterious of all the Jewish Feast Days. This May 24th marks this year’s festival, a day Jews believe the heavens open for a brief moment and they decorate the Bride. Wow. Everywhere one looks, Pentecost seems to be hinting at the Rapture of the Church. King David was born and died on Pentecost. According to rabbinic tradition, Enoch was born and died on Pentecost. The church, of course, was born on Pentecost as believers were indwelt permanently with the Holy Spirit for the first time. The hidden symbolism in the Feast Day makes one wonder—will the Church mark it’s original birthday with our calling away to eternity? Will the trumpet sound on May 24th? Or perhaps on a future Pentecost? Gary and Bob discuss some of the historical intracacies that point to a possible rapture on this day. This is an amazing study! Watch it!

item.title: Tom Horn & Cris Putnam: On the Path of the Immortals
item.itunes:summary: There’s a gigantic high-powered telescope sitting on the top of a high mountain in Arizona. It’s owned by none other than the Vatican—and it has been nicknamed “The L.U.C.I.F.E.R device.” The Jesuits claim to be monitoring “something” that is approaching the Earth. The mountain is said to be a portal, a stargate to another dimension. What, or WHO are they waiting for? Best-selling authors Tom Horn and Cris Putnam have blown the lid off of these dimensional portals in a way no one ever has before. Gaining access to private Indian reservations, Tom and Cris explore secret caves where they have gained access to the legend of “The Old Ones.” Those cave paintings feature beings with six fingers—shades of the Nephilim! Will these beings return to Earth one day? Their new book, On the Path of the Immortals, will take you places you’ve never been before!

item.title: Gary Stearman: Dispensationalism and the Pre-Trib Rapture
item.itunes:summary: Law vs Grace. This ages-old battle started long ago and reached a boiling point in the early church. Even the disciples were caught up in the confusion. Between these two points of view sits the controversial perspective of dispensational theology. You want to start a battle with extreme passion on both sides? Well, here you go. Gary and Bob discuss a complicated chapter in the book of Acts that Gary thinks should clear up the confusion, all the while producing added proof of a pre-tribulation rapture!

item.title: Stan Deyo: Cosmic Conspiracy
item.itunes:summary: When Gary and deep-thinking scientist Stan Deyo get together, you better put your thinking cap on! Stan’s background in anti-gravity experimentation and UFOs make him uniquely qualified to speak about things “you’ll never hear in church.” We’ve all heard of the Roswell “weather balloon” crash in 1947. But shortly thereafter Israel became a nation and high technology took off. Many people, including Stan and Gary, believe that we had a helping hand from “the other side” in using reverse technology to bring the world into the computer age. You will be amazed when you hear Stan talk about the bumblebee and hear him compare it’s God-designed flight capabilities to alien technology. The dark powers behind the “New World Order” have a carefully organized and orchestrated plan in place. It will come to fruition very soon. Don’t be deceived! When this program wrapped up, Gary was almost speechless! Great minds think alike!

item.title: Stan Deyo: The Garden of Eden
item.itunes:summary: Stan Deyo has led quite the fascinating life—working undercover for the FBI and gaining “top secret” government security clearance; working with Edward Teller, the father of the hydrogen bomb on “flying saucer” technology; lecturing on Tesla, biblical archaeology and UFOs—he’s seen things and been places no man has gone before. So when Stan claimed to have found the original Garden of Eden using the Bible as a road map and high technology as the hidden access key, people listened. This is an interview you will not want to miss!

item.title: Billy Crone: The Final Countdown
item.itunes:summary: Las Vegas pastor Billy Crone is shocking audiences all over the country, waking them from a deep prophetic slumber. While the Middle East reaches a boiling point and Iran moves closer to nuclear capabilities Americans continue to slowly lose their freedoms. The platform for the rise of the Antichrist is being constructed in plain sight. Surveillance technology is reaching new heights and our day to day movements are being tracked like never before. The advances in hand scanning, drones, and RFID technology is disturbing and Google’s secret plans to become “The Mind of God” are hard to believe. Join Gary and Billy Crone as they discuss “The Final Countdown” of world events.

item.title: L.A. Marzulli: Further Evidence
item.itunes:summary: In July of 1947 there was a “flying saucer” crash in Roswell, NM. In May 1948 Israel became a nation after nearly 2,000 years in exile. L.A. Marzulli believes it’s no coincidence. He’s been “on the trail” of the Nephilim for several years, but he’s also hot on the trail of the burgeoning UFO activity going on in the world. Will we have a government-sponsored revelation soon? Will an alien appearance explain away the rapture of the church? Is this the trigger event that will convince the whole world to believe the lie?

item.title: Billy Crone: The Days of Noah
item.itunes:summary: The subject of Nephilim hybrids, UFOs, Greek mythology and a highly advanced ancient civilization is sure to raise the ire of some “old school” Bible scholars. But leave it to Pastor Billy Crone to put these strange things in clear perspective. You simply can’t fully understand the Bible unless you understand the 6th chapter of Genesis and see the ongoing cosmic war that goes on behind the curtain in another dimension.

item.title: Richard Shaw: The Torah Codes
item.itunes:summary: Ten years ago, Messianic rabbi Yacov Rambsel introduced the Bible Code phenomenon to the world. Fast-forward ten years and say hello to Richard Shaw, L.A. Marzulli’s video producer and the co-creator of the Watchers DVD Series. Richard has a deep desire and passion to return the Torah Codes to prominence. Equidistant letter sequencing proves that there is an intelligent Creator behind the Scriptures. While Yacov poured over “the codes” from his scrolls and Interlinear Bible, Richard got on a plane, flew straight to Israel, and went right to the leading Torah Code experts in the world— famous Jewish rabbis like Rabbi Glazerson, Eliyahu Rips, Robert Haralick and Alex Rotenberg, men who’ve spent a lifetime examining this bizarre phenomenon. The results are truly extraordinary.

item.title: Gary Stearman: Israel in Prophecy
item.itunes:summary: The Bible is the only book that predicts the future. This is what makes it unique among all other religious works. There are no prophecies in the Quran or the Book of Mormon. Without Bible prophecy, the Bible simply wouldn’t be the Bible. Gary and Bob take a look at two amazing prophetic DVDs and how they prove beyond the shadow of a doubt that the Holy Scriptures are ordained by God. If you know the future, you must be God! Take a tour of the book of Revelation and see Israel like you’ve never seen it before. Ingenuity Films takes you right to ground zero to prove that the Bible is divinely inspired!

item.title: L.A. Marzulli: On the Trail of the Nephilim
item.itunes:summary: Author and researcher L.A. Marzulli gives new meaning to the words “breaking new ground.” Traveling to the archaeological treasure-trove of Peru, Marzulli uncovered a 3,500 year secret that puts the controversial mystery of Genesis 6 to rest. His follow up work, On the Trail of the Nephilim 2, takes the reader to Catalina Island where he uncovers the private diaries of an island grave-robber, whose “gigantic” pictures are worth a thousand words! Don’t miss these amazing revelations!
